body_html:
Hi ebrevdo,
yes, if I perform the embedding lookup for the whole sequence before feeding data to the RNN encoder it works. And yes, the goal is to implement a seq2seq model for sequence with variable lengths.
body_text:
Hi ebrevdo,
yes, if I perform the embedding lookup for the whole sequence before feeding data to the RNN encoder it works.  And yes, the goal is to implement a seq2seq model for sequence with variable lengths.
body:
Hi ebrevdo,
yes, if I perform the embedding lookup for the whole sequence before feeding data to the RNN encoder it works.  And yes, the goal is to implement a seq2seq model for sequence with variable lengths.
